isDraft.description: Indicates if this request is trying to save a draft or to submit.

programId.description: Indicates which program the physical inventory is done for. Will be used for all events created from this physical inventory.

facilityId.description: Indicates which facility the physical inventory is done for. Will be used for all events created from this physical inventory.

date.description: Will be used as occurred date for all events created from this physical inventory.

lineItems.title: Physical inventory line items, each will become an event when submitted.
